”Alexa, open sleep thunder rain”
”Alexa, start sleep thunder rain”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep thunder rain
des: A gentle alternative for those who suffer from fear of thunderstorms and lightning. Sleep Thunder Rain is made with the element of rain sounds and the pure essence of lavender to help you sleep peacefully. This sleep thunder rain is a natural and safe way to effectively help you relax into a deep, restful sleep.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
